actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Code to provide for the appointment of a commission in certain proceedings for the condemnation of real property in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Permits the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to appoint a commission to determine the issue of compensation arising out of land condemnation proceedings. Requires the appointment of such a commission where a substantial possibility exists that the final award of compensation will exceed $100,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Code to provide for the appointment of a commission in certain proceedings for the condemnation of real property in the District of Columbia.
